ela.carrier.name: Carrier
ela.carrier.description: Your Elabox is an active element of the Carrier P2P network. By running an active Carrier node you strengthen the network and in turn this provides better security for the whole ecosystem.

ela.mainchain.name: Mainchain
ela.mainchain.description: Your Elabox will be running a full ELA node. With your node you can: build, sign and send transactions with security and trust.
ela.mainchain.updates: Version 0.8.3. update compatibility for test network data.  Resolved cross-chain and side chain over-dependence on DPoS nodes

ela.eid.name: EID
ela.eid.description: Your Elabox will also be running a full Decentralized Identity (DID) node. This allows you to connect to the DID network and own your own data. With DIDs you can share only what you choose to share with any DApp.

ela.esc.name: ESC
ela.esc.description: The Smart Contract Chain (ESC) allows developers to code, deploy, and run their smart contracts on Ethereum Virtual Machines (EVMs). The sidechain also supports the execution of smart contracts written in Solidity.By utilizing DPoS Consensus, the Smart Contract Chain (ESC) acts as a high-performance, scalable smart contract execution solution.

ela.feeds.name: Feeds Node
ela.feeds.description: Feeds is a new, decentralized social platform where users remain in full control of the data they generate, and may also profit from it.

glide.name: Glide Finance
glide.description: Glide Finance is a Decentralized Exchange / Automated Market Maker, Yield Farming, and Staking platform running on the Elastos Smart Chain (ESC) that aims to accelerate adoption of the Elastos ecosystem by acting as a source of liquidity for users and the projects built on it.

trinity.pasar.name: Pasar V2
trinity.pasar.description: Pasar is a truly decentralized Web3.0 Marketplace, Collectible Explorer, and Analytics Platform for NFTs created on the Elastos Smart Chain (ESC).
trinity.pasar.updates: - Pasar Explorer to track non-fungible token (NFT) provenance. Login with Decentralized Identifier (DID). NFT minting. NFT Marketplace with fixed price

ipfs.name: IPFS
ipfs.description: The InterPlanetary File System is a protocol and peer-to-peer network for storing and sharing data in a distributed file system. IPFS uses content-addressing to uniquely identify each file in a global namespace connecting all computing devices.
ipfs.updates: First release of IPFS for elabox.

trinity.hive.name: Hive Node
trinity.hive.description: A flexible, decentralized storage solution with swappable storage constructs that allow for private storage and public decentralized storage behind robust Swift/Java SDKs for mobile and JS SDKs for the web.

elacity.name: Elacity
elacity.description: A flexible, decentralized storage solution with swappable storage constructs that allow for private storage and public decentralized storage behind robust Swift/Java SDKs for mobile and JS SDKs for the web.

filebrowser.name: File Browser
filebrowser.description: Filebrowser provides a file managing interface within a specified directory and it can be used to upload, delete, preview, rename and edit your files. It allows the creation of multiple users and each user can have its own directory. It can be used as a standalone app.
